[3] Thomas Eiter, Tobias Kaminski, Christoph Redl, and Antonius Weinzierl. Exploiting partial assignments for efficient evaluation of answer set programs with external source access. Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research, 62:665--727, July 2018. [ bib ]
[4] Thomas Eiter, Stefano Germano, Giovambattista Ianni, Tobias Kaminski, Christoph Redl, Peter Schüller, and Antonius Weinzierl. The DLVHEX system. KI - Künstliche Intelligenz, 32(2-3):187--189, August 2018. [ bib | DOI | http ]
HEX programs extend ASP with external atoms implemented in C++ or Python. DLVHEX is a solver for HEX that permits cyclic reasoning over external atoms and external value invention.
